subject: Re: [junit] Some questions about JUnit
msgSnippet: This is an excellent candidate for the Eclipse plugin, too. So said Erik Hanson on 4/15/2003 -------------------- ... If you use IDEA s integrated JUnit
messageBody:
This is an excellent candidate for the Eclipse plugin, too.

So said Erik Hanson on 4/15/2003 --------------------
"J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...> wrote:
> >So said Vladimir R. Bossicard on 4/14/2003 --------------------
> >If you've been beaten by "expected <......> but was <... ...>" I bet you
> >will :-)
>
> Yes. That really needs to be configurable. Either that or the machine
> needs to read my mind.

If you use IDEA's integrated JUnit feature, it will allow you to open a diff
window showing the expected on one side and the actual on another, and will
hilight the differences between the two.

It's pretty cool. Somebody might want to consider adding that to the Swing
JUnit UI.


Erik Hanson



Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
